title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Investigating sexual harassment and misconduct
description: A tipsheet providing guidance on investigating sexual harassment and misconduct, including tips on accessing public records, interviewing sensitive sources, breaking confidentiality barriers, staying organized, handling pushback, and fact-checking.
